pdescription: The Alchemist is a beautifully written story that has a timeless, mythical quality. It is easy to see how it has captivated people around the world
Eleven Minutes is a story about a young girl who is a prostitute by profession and is trying to learn and find the mysteries of the pleasure of the world.
In ninety days of pilgrimage the author traveled around the globe and took the famous Transiberrian train that took him to Vladivostok.
